Package clientSide.stubs

Class BarStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.BarStub
  • public class BarStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the bar. It instantiates a remote reference to the bar. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
    Author:
    Martim Neves, Tiago Dias

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BarStub​(java.lang.String hostName, int port)
      Stub instantiation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BarStub

        public BarStub​(java.lang.String hostName,
               int port)
        Stub instantiation.
        Parameters:
        hostName - name of the platform where the bar server is located.
        port - Number of server listening port.

    • Method Detail

      • saluteTheClient

        public void saluteTheClient()
        Salutes the client and waits for the student to read the menu. Notifies the student that he has been saluted.

      • alertTheWaiter

        public void alertTheWaiter()
        Notifies a new order in the requests queue.

      • returningToTheBar

        public void returningToTheBar()
        Waiter returns to the bar.

      • prepareTheBill

        public void prepareTheBill()
        Waiter prepares the bill.

      • lookAround

        public int lookAround()
        Waiter is waiting for a request.
        Returns:
        result the communication result

      • sayGoodbye

        public void sayGoodbye()
        Waiter says goodbye to students.

      • signalTheWaiter

        public void signalTheWaiter​(int sID)
        Student signals the waiter to bring the next course. Notifies the waiter that all the people already ate.
        Parameters:
        sID - student id

      • callTheWaiter

        public void callTheWaiter()
        Student calls the waiter when everyone has chosen. Notifies a new order in the requests queue.

      • enter

        public void enter()
        Student enters the restaurant. Notifies the waiter that a student has entered. Adds a request of type SALUTE_THE_CLIENT to the queue.

      • FirstStudent

        public boolean FirstStudent​(int sID)
        Checks if the student was the first to enter
        Parameters:
        sID - student id
        Returns:
        true if it was the first to enter, false otherwise

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Student leaves the restaurant. Notifies the waiter that a student has left. Adds a request of type SAY_GOODBYE to the queue.

      • shouldHaveArrivedEarlier

        public boolean shouldHaveArrivedEarlier​(int sID)
        Gets the id of the student who arrived last. Notifies a new order in the requests queue.
        Parameters:
        sID - student id
        Returns:
        boolean if the student was the last to enter the restaurant

      • readTheMenu

        public void readTheMenu()
        Student reads the menu. Notifies the waiter that he has read the menu.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Operation server shutdown. New operation.
